org.nd4j.linalg.learning

Interface GradientUpdater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaDelta, AdaGrad, Adam, Nesterovs, RmsProp, Sgd

    public interface GradientUpdater
extends java.io.Serializable
    Gradient modifications: Calculates an update and tracks related information for gradient changes over time for handling updates.
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
